ygData.subject: Sphink sees trouble.-drillbit
ygData.msgSnippet: Sphink watched the maximal geting attacked. He grimaced. Hmmm. he sent a comm to drillbit. The maximals are outnumbered and out gunned. Should we send aid

Subject: Sphink sees trouble.-drillbit

 Sphink watched the maximal geting attacked. He grimaced. "Hmmm." he sent a 
comm to drillbit. "The maximals are outnumbered and out gunned. Should we 
send aid or leave them there to die?" he didnt care witch way besides the 
alliance factor. Without the maximals it would be a lot harder to take them 
out eventualy.
